name: Dreamscape (itch) (Sunfished)
description:
A prototype Metroidvania for IGMC2018

After a good bedtime story from her parents, a young girl named Remie wakes up in the middle of the night, only to find that she's in a dreamworld based on her memories. In her dreams, she can utilize pairs of gloves that each create a magical attack! You can pair two mismatching ones for a different attack on each hand. 
Find and try out each of them as you go through the Dreamscape and meet the mysterious Sandman as he guides Remie through.

The game may or may not be picked up in the future, but time will tell!

Controls:

Left/Right - Move

Up - Talk

Down - Crouch

Z - Jump (Used to go through Text)

X - Left Hand

C - Right Hand

A - Inventory
